name: ASYNC
description:
35th GM48 (Ranked 11/65) Theme: Two Sides

This game was an entry for the 35th GM48. 

View original submission here: https://gm48.net/game/1617/async

The Jam Version of the game is the exact same as the one on the gm48 page.

Story

You control a cute cube, wait I meant you control 2 cute cubes... Solve puzzles by synchronizing with the environment.

Controls WASD   Moving RRestart LevelE Switch (Not Available from start)ALT + Enter Toggle Fullscreen 1-3Change Window Size Credits EverythingWinuX Palletehttps://lospec.com/palette-list/pear36
